channel.title: Highlights: Find and prioritize your biggest marketing opportunities, instantly
channel.description:
Hey guys! We're creating Highlights to help busy founders and solopreneurs find and prioritize the biggest marketing opportunities from their analytics and email marketing tools.
It's _almost_ magic: ;-)
1. You connect your analytics and email marketing tools 2. We analyze performance and trends to identify optimization opportunities
- Are your upsell emails becoming less effective? - Can an old blog post drive new revenue? - Are email clicks leading to bounces on your website?
3. We prioritize improvements based on volume and the impact on your business' bottom-line 4. You make the changes, we track the performance
Thank you for taking a look!

item.title: Highlights: Find and prioritize your biggest marketing opportunities, instantly
item.dc:creator: egarbugli
item.description:
@danielherken @Dmitry You guys can see for yourselves. We launched Highlights less than 36 hours ago.

Bootstrapped and proud.

Read full topic
item.source: Highlights: Find and prioritize your biggest marketing opportunities, instantly

item.title: Highlights: Find and prioritize your biggest marketing opportunities, instantly
item.dc:creator: rfctr
item.description:
Dmitry:

However, I don’t really understand how it works.

The general approach is described right on the landing page: I.C.E.. The service apparently saves you the time you’d have to invest yourself listing all the improvement opportunities and assigning them the ICE rating.

Read full topic
item.source: Highlights: Find and prioritize your biggest marketing opportunities, instantly

item.title: Highlights: Find and prioritize your biggest marketing opportunities, instantly
item.dc:creator: egarbugli
item.description:
Good point. Of course we can give a lot more intelligence when/if goals and conversions are properly configured, but there’s actually a lot that can be done with default metrics (bounces, opens, clicks, click paths, etc) and tracking (trends, volume, etc). The algorithm already works quite well, we’re excited to release a first version in a month or so.

Read full topic
item.source: Highlights: Find and prioritize your biggest marketing opportunities, instantly

item.title: Highlights: Find and prioritize your biggest marketing opportunities, instantly
item.dc:creator: Dmitry
item.description:
egarbugli:

Does the product make sense to you?

Yes, it does make sense. However, I don’t really understand how it works. “Too good to be true”, I agree with @danielherken

Also, I still, even after 10+ years in business, do not have properly configured goals and conversion tracking. It seems a requirement for your service to have properly configured analytics for web site, emails, purchases etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Highlights: Find and prioritize your biggest marketing opportunities, instantly

item.title: Highlights: Find and prioritize your biggest marketing opportunities, instantly
item.dc:creator: egarbugli
item.description:
Awesome! What aspect is the most important for you guys? What would add the most value?

Hey guys! We’re creating Highlights to help busy founders and solopreneurs find and prioritize the biggest marketing opportunities from their analytics and email marketing tools.

  1. You connect your analytics and email marketing tools
  2. We analyze performance and trends to identify optimization opportunities

  • Can an old blog post drive new revenue?
  • Are email clicks leading to bounces on your website?
